body:
ami guru wrote:


> I am running ubuntu and i have installed radiance as  a debian package.


Good idea on Debian and all derivates is to read the README.Debian files of a
package if there is one.
/usr/share/doc/radiance/README.Debian :)


Cheers,


Bernd
